mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.item_id, b.d_sequence_num, b.heat_number, b.ship_number, b.section_num, b.size, d.locator_code as adv_locator_code, d.locator_name as adv_locator_name, f.locator_name as excu_locator_name, f.locator_code as excu_locator_code FROM wms_inbound_order_detail a LEFT JOIN wms_sgl_item b on a.adv_barcode = b.d_sequence_num LEFT JOIN wms_inbound_order_line c on a.line_id = c.line_id LEFT JOIN wms_locator d on a.adv_locator_id = d.locator_id LEFT JOIN wms_locator f on a.excu_locator_id = f.locator_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
